bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LVII (Nos 3876-3914)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.note: P. Oxy. LVII, 3876-3914. - I. New Literary Text [Stesichorus] (3876). - II. Known Literary Texts [Thucydides] (3877-3901). - III. Documentary Texts (3902-3914).
bibl.seg: HASLAM M.W., H. EL-MAGHRABI and J.D. THOMAS, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LVII (Nos 3876-3914). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 77.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1990, 8Â°, xii-153 pp. et VIII pll.
P. Oxy. LVII, 3876-3914. - I. New Literary Text [Stesichorus] (3876). - II. Known Literary Texts [Thucydides] (3877-3901). - III. Documentary Texts (3902-3914).

C.R. par Giuliana Foti-Talamanca, Iura 41 (1990 [1993]) pp. 222-223. - Rosa Giannattasio Andria, Eikasmos 2 (1991) pp. 387-391 [concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LVI]. - V.N. Jarkho, VDI 201 (1992, fasc. 2) pp. 205-210 [concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LVI]. - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 69 (1994) No. 137, pp. 169-172. - Wolfgang Luppe, Gnomon 64 (1992) pp. 289-299 [concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LVI]. - Kathleen McNamee, BASP 28 (1991) pp. 201-208. - Bernhard Palme, Tyche 9 (1994) pp. 244-245. - Dominic W. Rathbone, CR N.S., 42 (1992) pp. 413-414. - Hans-Albert Rupprecht, ZSav 109 (1992) pp. 592-599 [concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LIV; - LV; - LVI]. - Jean A. Straus, BibO 49 (1992) coll. 743-745.
